text:
This is not a filmed play. It has been conceived throughout in terms of the cinema, and again and again it is the visual qualities of the story, and the marriage of the central characters to their background, which bring the film so vividly to life. In Fanny, which also has its premiere tomorrow, the director, Mr. Joshua Logan, attempted but failed to create the atmosphere of a city.
